name: Defenders of the Vox
description:
Control a miniature army and defend your precious statue from the invading forces of evil. Summon heroes, and cast magic spells as you hold off wave after wave of attackers in order to prevent evil from fully unleashing on GridEarth.

Features

  • RTS Lite gameplay
  • Level up your abilities in between waves
  • Survive as long as you can


The game is not finished but here is a quick look at some of the upcoming features:

Upcoming Features

  • Ranged Enemies
  • Additional Enemies
  • Additional Game Balance and Progression
  • Leaderboards
